summary: This bill, the "Foreclosure Assistance Immediately Reinstated for Veterans Act of 2025" or "FAIR Veterans Act of 2025," expresses the sense of Congress that the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) should prioritize helping veterans keep their homes and use existing authorities, particularly the Veterans Affairs Servicing Purchasing program (VASP), to prevent foreclosures. It clarifies and amends Section 3732(a)(2)(A) of title 38, United States Code, related to the VASP program.
